com.decoded.polldancer

Class PollDancer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.decoded.polldancer.PollDancer

  • public class PollDancer
extends java.lang.Object
    Poll dancer is a non blocking mechanism for callbacks. Thread A can triggerNow the PollDancer, that will ultimately notify thread b by setting an internal atomic boolean upon which thread B is polling. When the boolean triggers, the onPollMethod called in a non-blocking fashion.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PollDancer(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService, java.lang.Runnable triggerCallback) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PollDancer setMaxTimeoutMs(long maxTimeoutMs)
      Set the max timeout that poll dancer will wait before considering the operation to be "un-ending" and timeout.
      PollDancer setPollIntervalMs(long pollIntervalMs)
      The interval at which poll dancer will check for the focused object to be updated.
      PollDancer setPollTrigger(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> triggerFun)
      Adds a wrapped supplier and triggers the poll dancer when the supplier is called.
      PollDancer setTriggerCallback()
      The Trigger Callback
      PollDancer start()
      Starts the polling action (the PollDance)
      PollDancer stop()
      Stop the poll dancer and clear the state.
      void triggerNow()
      Trigger the poll dancer and stop the polling action.

      • setMaxTimeoutMs

        public PollDancer setMaxTimeoutMs(long maxTimeoutMs)
        Set the max timeout that poll dancer will wait before considering the operation to be "un-ending" and timeout.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • setPollTrigger

        public PollDancer setPollTrigger(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> triggerFun)
        Adds a wrapped supplier and triggers the poll dancer when the supplier is called.
        Parameters:
        triggerFun - a triggerNow method that, when called will triggerNow poll dancer
        Returns:
        a Supplier that will return the result of calling the triggerNow method, and if the triggerNow method returns true, the poll dancer is effectively triggered.

      • triggerNow

        public void triggerNow()
        Trigger the poll dancer and stop the polling action.

        Returns:

      • stop

        public PollDancer stop()

        Returns:
        this poll dancer.
